## Smooth deformations

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(x3pr)
library(x3prplus)
library(plotly)

br111 <- read.x3pplus("~/GitHub/imaging-paper/images/Hamby (2009) Barrel/bullets/Br1 Bullet 1-1.x3p")
br111_fortified <- fortify_x3p(br111)
br111_fortsub <- br111_fortified
br111_fortsub$value[br111_fortsub$y > 1000 & br111_fortsub$y < 1500] <- br111_fortsub$value[br111_fortsub$y > 1000 & br111_fortsub$y < 1500] / 2

br111_new <- unfortify_x3p(br111_fortsub)

plot_ly(z = br111_new$surface.matrix, type = "surface")
```
